scripts.start: export FE_PORT=8000&& export FE_MODE=production&& npm run lint && npm run pack && ./scripts/portredirect.sh && node -r esm static-server.js
scripts.test: export FE_PORT=8080&& export FE_MODE=development&& npm run lint && npm run watch-pack && ./scripts/noredirect.sh && node -r esm static-server.js && kill $WATCH_PID
scripts.static: npm run lint && npm run watch-pack && serve -p 8080 public
scripts.tests: npm run lint && npm run pack && node -r esm public/src/tests.js
